name: SpotCam
0:
”Alexa, show the baby room”
”Alexa, show the feed from the front door”
”Alexa, hide the kids room”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
SpotCam is designed to help you look after your home and family - even when you're away. Now you can view your SpotCam video using Alexa with your Echo Show, Echo Spot, Fire TV, Fire Stick or Fire tablet.

To get started, select the "Enable Skill" button to link your SpotCam account and discover your SpotCam.

After linking your SpotCam account and discovering your SpotCam in your Alexa account, you can start streaming live video to your Echo Show, Echo Spot, Fire TV or Fire Tablets (Gen7 & above). To see your SpotCam feed on the device, just say commands like:
- "Alexa, show my backyard camera"
- "Alexa, show the feed from the kids room"

To stop your SpotCam from streaming video, you can say:
- "Alexa, stop"
- "Alexa, hide the backyard camera"
- "Alexa, go home"

Learn more about how Alexa works with SpotCam:
https://www.myspotcam.com/en/welcome/support/?mo=no

Compatible Amazon Alexa Devices:
- Echo Show
- Echo Spot
- All generations of Fire TV
- Second generations of Fire TV stick
- Fire TV Edition smart TVs
- Fire Tablets (generation 7 and above)

* When using this skill, you need to specify the name of the desired camera. The name is editable to be equivalent to location of where the camera was installed or can be found and edited in the SpotCam app. You can also add SpotCam cameras to new or existing groups in the Alexa app.
